transportAdvice: Kuwait City is not particularly walkable due to extreme summer heat, sprawling urban layout, and limited pedestrian infrastructure, so most visitors rely on taxis or private vehicles. Public buses operate across the city but are not well-suited for tourist areas; taxis are widely available and the most practical option for getting around.
